author: lgo
msg: Continue working on the Secure Transport ssl handshake, start implementation-
cert_certificate and cert_export methods to this vtable.
(struct serf_ssl_certificate_t): Move type here. Add implementation-specific
serf__openssl_cert_export): Use the updated serf_ssl_certificate_t type.
(*): Naming convention, always use ssl_ctx for a sectrans_context_t *.
(struct sectrans_context_t): Add allocator and server certificate callbacks.
(sectrans_init_context): Create the encrypt and decrypt stream objects
(in analogy with openssl_buckets). Instruct Secure Transport to break the
handshake when a server certificate is received during the handshake.
(get_hostname): New function, gets hostname from Secure Transport API.
(do_handshake): Call validate_server_certificate when a server certificate
encrypt_create): Setup the new encrypt and decrypt streams.
(serf_sectrans_encrypt_read): Correctly handle the initial handshake and
serf_ssl_cert_export): Now wrappers to specific implementations.
* SConstruct: Add CoreFoundation framework for string functions in Secure

author: lgo
msg: update handshaking code to also work with more data (many certificates...).
(sectrans_read_cb): Fix actual and remaining received data calculations.
(serf_sectrans_encrypt_read): Reorder code a bit, in preparation for next

author: lgo
msg: (sectrans_read_cb): Fix non-const pointer. Fix line to wide.

author: lgo
msg: (*): Implement the basic framework of Secure Transport-based ssl/tls
communication. Currently the handshake works, certificate validation
